text: The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 85.19 feet on Thursday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level of the dam was 47.325 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 203 cusecs. About 15,000 cusecs of water is discharged from the dam for Samba cultivation in the Cauvery delta region. Another 400 cusecs is let out for irrigation activities under the dam’s East-West canal system in Salem, Namakkal and Erode districts.
title: Mettur Dam level
